TopicTitle: [Solved] Name of Mod who collects multiple sci reports/stores at comandpod

Articles.Content:
Hi

There is a mod out there who lets your store more than one sci report in your command unit. Also it has, collect all and collect rerunable switches. and a Toggle auto collection button....

I cant remember that name of it.

Hope this will get uodated for 1.0 :-)

thanks again

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-30T09:42:19Z" title="04/30/2015 09:42  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 30, 2015</time> by ManuxKerb**

There is [ForScience](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/76437-Plugin-24-2-For-Science%21-Science-Automation-%28Aug-13th-2014%29) by [WaveFunctionP](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/107709-WaveFunctionP) and [ForScienceContinued](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106004-0-90-ForScience-Continued-V0-26-1-17-04-2015) by me. But from your description it sounds a lot like the latter.

At a quick look [ForScienceContinued](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106004-0-90-ForScience-Continued-V0-26-1-17-04-2015) should still work with 1.0 but it will get a patch sometime soon anyways to fix a few bugs.

Hi

Wow that was quick,

Is it possible with for science cont. also to transfer the sci between different command units at the vessel, if so, it is the mod im looking for :-)
Directly ? No, but you can change the target part and it will move all experiment results there.
I think ship manifest will transfer science around between parts, but I don't know if/when it's going to be updated to 1.0.

You might be looking for the Field Science backpack mod: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106562-0-90-KAS-EVA-Portable-Science-Container-and-Transmitter-v1-2?highlight=field+scientist](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106562-0-90-KAS-EVA-Portable-Science-Container-and-Transmitter-v1-2?highlight=field+scientist)

Not updated yet however and it requires KAS, though it should convert to KIS.

Edit: Should have read the OP better, but still an useful mod.

I found it!

Its this one: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90678-0-90-Science-Containers-v-08-2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/90678-0-90-Science-Containers-v-08-2)
